card.description: A dataset of movies released from 1986-2016, with box office numbers, ratings, IMDB scores, and more.

context.potentialUses: For example, determine a movie's box office by its budget or genre.

Budget.description: The budget of the film in USD. Films with no budget data have 0 here.

Runtime.description: How long the movie is in minutes.

Score.description: The IMDb user rating for the movie.

Rating.description: The MPAA rating, from G (all ages) to NC-17 (no children under 17).

Released.description: The month it was released in.

Votes.description: Number of votes the movie received in IMDB.

Year.description: The year it was released in.
